content.data: Library Parts
Shaping.png
At the Orthographic levels you may save Parts to your Part Library or add those Library Parts to your Assemblies.
To save a part to the Part Library:

Right-Click on the desired Part. 
 
 
 Click Save to Library.
Right-Click on the desired Part.
Right-Click on the desired Part.
Click Save to Library.
Click Save to Library.
image3103.gif
image445.png
Select the library from the list on the left where you want to save this Part.
Select the library from the list on the left where you want to save this Part.
Select the library from the list on the left where you want to save this Part.
image462.png
Click OK.
Click OK.
Click OK.
To Add a Part to the Cabinet From the Part Library:
Click the Library Part button in the sidebar.
Click the Library Part button in the sidebar.
Click the Library Part button in the sidebar.
image474.png
The Part Library window will appear.
The Part Library window will appear.
The Part Library window will appear.
image486.png
On the left side, select the Catalog where the desired Part is located. Then click the Part that you want to add and click Next.
On the left side, select the Catalog where the desired Part is located. Then click the Part that you want to add and click Next.
On the left side, select the Catalog where the desired Part is located. Then click the Part that you want to add and click Next.
image497.png
In the next window, type in the size that you want to have the Library Part come in at.
In the next window, type in the size that you want to have the Library Part come in at.
In the next window, type in the size that you want to have the Library Part come in at.
image515.png
Choose the orientation that you want the new Part to have.
Choose the orientation that you want the new Part to have.
Choose the orientation that you want the new Part to have.
image544.png
Select the desired  Finish  for the new Part. Click Finish to complete the process of importing the Library Part.
Select the desired  Finish  for the new Part. Click Finish to complete the process of importing the Library Part.
Select the desired  Finish  for the new Part. Click Finish to complete the process of importing the Library Part.
image545.png
Use the size and position fields in the sidebar to locate the Part properly in the Assembly.
image6008.gif
